name: Kaiju Girlfriend: That time I started dating a monster girl
name_original: Kaiju Girlfriend: That time I started dating a monster girl
description:
Tonight is the night!

That's right! Tonight is the night you've been waiting for all this time!
You'll meet your date at her house and you have your suspicions that she's a monster!

Play as a nameless monster investigator that's about to have a date with a mysterious girl you found on the "Pickr" dating app and choose between your job as a monster investigator or a love life with a monster girl.

Investigate your date's house!

Check every nook and cranny of the house and find any evidence that could help you prove that monsters exist!
Find items to use around the house, find passwords, codes and solve puzzles to get every piece of evidence you can get!

Or just enjoy your date!

That's another option, you know. We're not here to judge!
After every investigation bit there's the dating sections where you can just enjoy your night with your mysterious date!

Be a charming casanova... or an insensitive prick. Again, no judging here...
